Package arc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application  
    ApplicationListener
    An ApplicationListener is called when the Application is created, resumed, rendering, paused or destroyed.
    Files
    Provides standard access to the filesystem, classpath, Android SD card, and Android assets directory.
    Graphics.Cursor
    Represents a mouse cursor.
    KeyBinds.KeyBind
    An interface to store type-safe keybind definitions.
    KeyBinds.KeybindValue
    Represents an axis or a KeyCode.
    Net.HttpResponse
    HTTP response interface with methods to get the response data as a byte[], a String or an InputStream.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationCore  
    Core
    Note that all resources are automatically disposed of in Application.dispose().
    Events  
    Graphics
    This interface encapsulates communication with the graphics processor.
    Graphics.BufferFormat
    Class describing the bits per pixel, depth buffer precision, stencil precision and number of MSAA samples.
    Graphics.DisplayMode
    Describe a fullscreen display mode
    Graphics.Monitor
    Describes a monitor
    Input
    Interface to the input facilities.
    Input.TextInput
    Parameters for text input.
    KeyBinds
    Stores keybinds.
    KeyBinds.Axis  
    KeyBinds.Section
    A section represents a set of input binds, like controls for a specific player.
    Net
    Provides methods to perform networking operations, such as simple HTTP get and post requests, and TCP server/client socket communication.
    Net.HttpRequest  
    Settings  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Application.ApplicationType
    Enumeration of possible Application types
    Files.FileType
    Indicates how to resolve a path to a file.
    Graphics.Cursor.SystemCursor  
    Input.Orientation  
    Input.Peripheral
    Enumeration of potentially available peripherals.
    Net.HttpMethod
    Provides all HTTP methods to use when creating a Net.HttpRequest.
    Net.HttpStatus
    Defines the status of an HTTP request.
